author: Alessandra Foresto
title: Latin Pies Recipes
text:
We're just going to say it: we wouldn't blame you if you decided to scratch dinner and just ate one of the 17 pies ahead â€” straight from the pan, standing up by the oven. No judging here, we've all done it before, and there's no doubt that once you see the recipes ahead, you'll be doing it again. You'll want to taste the dulce de leche pie and have a full slice of the coffee one, and you'll definitely pretend the pineapple pie is healthy, just so you can have more of the brigadeiro kind, too. Please, join us in our feast.
